Tune Home Range

Source: vignettes/articles/tune_home_range.Rmd
tune_home_range.Rmd
library(marlin)
seasons <- 1
fauna <-
  list(
    "bigeye" = create_critter(
      common_name = "bigeye tuna",
      adult_diffusion = 10,
      adult_home_range = 10,
      density_dependence = "local_habitat",
      seasons = seasons,
      fished_depletion = .25,
      resolution = c(10,10),
      steepness = 0.6,
      ssb0 = 42,
      m = 0.4
    )
  )
#> Warning in f(names[[col]]): NAs introduced by coercion

fauna$bigeye$adult_diffusion
#> [1] 13.37194
